desc: Canada/US Wide Designer and Wholesaler of Solar & Geothermal Solutions. Products include Air to Water Heat pumps, Geothermal Heat Pumps, Solar Pumping Stations, Solar Heaters, Hydronic Systems, Vacuum Tube Solar Collectors, Stainless Steel Corrugated Solar pipes, & More. Call us! Canada Wide +1-888-686-7652

layout.text: A Single Solar Panel, 2 in 1 Photovoltaic and Thermal, produces hot water and electricty at the same time. A Cost Saving Alternative to Conventional Solar PV and Thermal Panels
